q: Franchise tag will be part of negotiating game for players, NFL Will the Eagles be able to use the franchise tag to keep Michael Vick off the open market? I assume if the union does not believe that the franchise tag can be applied that they will challenge that through the normal process, Goodell said as he met with reporters in Arlington, Texas. "That is only one example of the close ties woven between Tony Blair and Gordon Brown , when they were prime ministers, and Cameron now, and the Murdoch camp- the private meetings and dinners, the calls( no hacking there) and the mutual interest. We once used to think of the establishment as being cabinet ministers, archbishops, BBC panjandrums, leaders of industry and royalty. No longer. It's the links between the government and the Murdoch empire that count today- a shadowy influence-mart. - The Guardian " Government of Tunisia shuts down TV channel " "Tunisia's interim government abruptly shut down the country's oldest and most popular private television network on Sunday evening,
